sections.heading: Creation of Health and Aging Services Administration Within Department of Health and Human Services; Transfer of the Commission on Services to the Aging and the Adult Community Placement Program From the Aging and Adult Services Agency to the Department of Health and Human Services; Transfer of Powe
sections.text: Creation of Health and Aging Services Administration Within Department of Health and Human Services; Transfer of the Commission on Services to the Aging and the Adult Community Placement Program From the Aging and Adult Services Agency to the Department of Health and Human Services; Transfer of Powers and Duties of the Medical Services Administration and the Aging and Adult Services Agency to the Health and Aging Services Administration; Abolishment of the Medical Services Administration and the Aging and Adult Services Agency.
